articles.title: Is the regional banking crisis really over now? Investors think so. - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Regional bank stocks just had their best week in more than a year, even though executives warned that revenues and profits are still under pressure.
articles.content:
Four months ago, Western Alliance (WAL) was in the throes of a crisis as depositors fled after the fall of Silicon Valley Bank. This week, executives made it sound like that drama was in the past.
